name: Spiritual Guardian Frog
description:
Game done with pygame 1.9.6 for "Just Another Jam" game jam, submited 30 segs after it ended xD. Better luck next time.

You play as a guardian frog, the only one who can protect the last cherry blossom from the malicious yookai ghost who want to destroy it.

Controls:

  • Toggle Fullscreen = "Esc"
  • Move = Arrow keys
  • Attack = "Z"
